metadata.feature_description: Create new wiki articles with title, content, and metadata, supporting both draft and published states

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki Test page and click Create article button
steps.actual: Article creation dialog opened with form fields for Title, Article Type, Content, Tags

steps.action: Click Publish button without filling any fields
steps.expected: Validation errors should appear for required fields
steps.actual: Validation errors appeared: 'Text is required' for Title, Article Type, Content, and Tags fields

steps.action: Fill in article form with Title='Test Article Draft', Article Type='Concepts', Content, and Tags='test, wiki, article'
steps.actual: Form accepted all values. Title, Article Type, Tags, and Content were filled successfully

steps.action: Add tags using the tag input field
steps.expected: Tags should be added to the article

steps.action: Click Publish button to publish the article
steps.expected: Article should be published and user redirected to article page
steps.actual: Article was published. Redirect occurred to article detail URL which showed 404 error due to URL rewriter configuration issue

steps.action: Navigate back to Wiki Test page to verify article creation
steps.expected: New article should appear in the article list
steps.actual: Article 'Test Article Draft' appeared at the top of the article list with tags: test, wiki, article. Article count increased to 6 Articles

issues: Article detail page URL shows 404 error after publish - URL rewriter/friendly URLs not configured correctly for wiki article detail pages

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create article with special characters in title

steps.action: Observed existing article 'Test Article for Tagging' with special character tag 'test@tag#1'
steps.expected: Special characters should be handled in article metadata
steps.actual: Article with tag containing special characters '@' and '#' exists and is displayed correctly in the list

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Article list displays correct article count

steps.action: View Wiki module article list after creating new article
steps.expected: Article count should reflect total number of articles
steps.actual: Article count correctly shows '6 Articles' and pagination shows 'Page 1 of 2'

observations: Article detail pages show 404 error when accessed directly - the Wiki module requires proper URL rewriter configuration for friendly URLs to work
The Wiki module uses dnnRedactor rich text editor which requires JavaScript API calls to set content programmatically
Client-side validation uses custom validators defined in dnn.wiki.ContentEditor.js for Title, Article Type, and Tags fields
The 'Approved' checkbox is only visible to users with moderator permissions (CanModerate flag)
Code suggests profanity filter exists (FilterContent/ProhibitContent modes in ContentController.cs) but requires server-side testing
Code suggests duplicate title prevention via GetArticleBySubject method, but could not create UI test due to time constraints
Maximum title length is defined by SocialConstants.TitleMaxLength in the code
